mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IN_MANAGEMENT (INCODE, PROCODE, INPRICE, INNUM, INPUTDATE) VALUES (#{ incode }, #{ procode }, #{ inPrice }, #{ inNum }, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM IN_MANAGEMENT ORDER BY INCODE DESC
SELECT * FROM IN_MANAGEMENT WHERE INCODE = #{ incode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IN_MANAGEMENT WHERE INCODE = #{ incode }
